---
category: news
title: "Robot artist recites its poetry at Oxford museum"
excerpt: "Ai-Da is thought to be the first artificial intelligence (AI) robot to write and perform poetry. The android artist is currently reciting its poetry at Oxford's Ashmolean Museum. It produced the poetry in response to the work of Italian poet Dante Alighieri who is being celebrated at an exhibition - 700 years after his death."
